name: The Path (itch) (Wolfy)
description:
A Showcase Game based on a song, called Waltz of The Wraiths.

Hope you enjoy it. (I don't own the background music, it's made by Matt Conaway )

 * The drawing is made by an artist called Ekokuron *

(It's my first game that I made, so it might be laggy or low-graphic standard, sorry~)

Thanks for playing my game, it really supports me a lot!  :D
